title: HOLY GOD, WE PRAISE THY NAME

verses:
Holy God, we praise thy name; Lord of all, we bow before thee!
All on earth thy rule acclaim, All in heaven above adore thee;
Infinite thy vast domain, Everlasting is thy reign.
Infinite 
thy vast domain, Everlasting is thy reign.

Hark! The loud celestial hymn Angel choirs above are raising,
Cherubinm and seraphim, In unceasing chorus praising;
Fill the heaven with sweet accord: "Holy, holy, holy Lord.
Fill the 
heavens with sweet accord: "Holy, holy, holy Lord.
